original_text: They shall be even an abomination unto you; ye shall not eat of their flesh, but ye shall have their carcases in abomination.
korean_text: 이들은 너희에게 가증한 것이니 너희는 그 고기를 먹지 말고 그 주검을 가증히 여기라

sentences.original_text: They shall be even an abomination unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 너희에게 가증한 것이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: ye shall not eat of their flesh
but ye shall have their carcases in abomination
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 그들의 사체를 가증히 여기라
